Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Rosecrest Street, west of the Sleepy Traveler Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The Sleepy Traveler Inn is a small residence for long-term visitors to Oceancrest. The accomodations are less comfortable than in the Evenborough Inn, but made primarily for people who plan to stay for weeks or months at a time. On the west side of the road is the Evenborough Stables, where visitors may leave their horses while visiting Oceancrest.
